humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is one positive intramammary lymph node (marked 1/1) and no evidence of metastatic disease in 37 axillary lymph nodes. The AJCC staging manual does not specifically address positive intramammary nodes in the absence of axillary metastatic disease, but the patient will be staged as having N1 disease.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is one positive intramammary lymph node (pN1) and no evidence of metastatic disease in 37 axillary lymph nodes. The AJCC Staging Manual does not provide specific guidance for staging positive intramammary nodes in the absence of axillary metastatic disease, but the patient will be staged as having N1 disease.
